item.title: The inaugural Bitcoin conference in China will take place in May
item.description:
Bitfund.pe, a private equity firm focused on Bitcoin, and UBM China have jointly revealed plans for the first international Bitcoin conference in China. This event, the Global Bitcoin Summit 2014 (GBS), is scheduled for May 10-11 in Beijing. Source: GBS The summit will be structured around eight key themes, featuring conversations on Bitcoin trends both within China and globally. Additionally, there will be exploration of how to leverage Bitcoin for new business creation and expansion of existing ventures...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-inaugural-bitcoin-conference-in-china-will-take-place-in-may/
